thread.title: Taimur Ali Khan’s first picture is out and we are literally speechless
thread.title_full: Taimur Ali Khan’s first picture is out and we are literally speechless

author: Entertainment Desk
title: Taimur Ali Khan’s first picture is out and we are literally speechless
text:
Share Tweet Email Saif and Kareena. PHOTO: INDIAN EXPRESS 
Saif Ali Khan and Kareena Kapoor Khan embraced parenthood after welcoming son, Taimur Ali Khan in December, last year. 
Soon after the baby’s birth, many pictures went viral on social media, claiming to be Saifeena’s newborn’s first glimpse. However, all rumours were laid to rest when a family picture was released, with Saif, Kareena and Taimur all in one frame. 
Now, Taimur’s first clear picture is finally out and OMG! we are literally short of words! 
That blond hair, those grey eyes and that adorable pout has us fixated on his gorgeous face! 
Have a look here: A photo posted by Kareena Kapoor Khan (@therealkareenakapoor) on Feb 12, 2017 at 2:46pm PST 
According to Bollywood Lif e , Bollywood superstar Priyanka Chopra, too, can’t seem to stop gushing over Taimur’s adorable looks! “It is such a wonderful moment and it is such a beautiful baby and he already has Kareena’s pout.” 
Kareena, too had proudly replied to the praises saying, “My son is the most gorgeous man this side of the equator. I take it as a compliment because yes his lips are amazing.” 
I have a husband, my priorities are different from Priyanka’s, says Kareena Kapoor 
“There are a lot of responsibilities on you once you become a mother. You feel that your heart is not beating inside you but outside your body and that is the biggest responsibility. Both me and Saif always wanted this. We used to talk about all these things. Both of us see ourselves in Taimur and this is the most special thing.” said mommy Kareena. 
We cannot wait for more pictures of baby Taimur! 
Have something to add in the story? Share it in the comments below.
